enhanced_description: Opra Group, launched in 2017 and headquartered in Basildon, Essex, provides a comprehensive range of 'People Solutions' designed for businesses and applicants. Their offerings include end-to-end recruitment services (from initial brief to offer management and onboarding), pre-employment screening, and managing organizational change through expert HR consultancy. They also specialize in developing potential within businesses via bespoke training and apprenticeship programs. For businesses, Opra Group offers customized HR services, compliance, and wellbeing packages, including workshops and sessions on work-related subjects. For individuals, they assist in finding new jobs, apprenticeships, or OPRA Flex contracts, aiming to connect talented individuals from diverse pools with people-centric organizations.
